Name: Shadow of the Night
About the game: Hunt and fight this nature's challenges! A system where you can see the difficulty level for each different section and your own bear killing score at these difficulty levels. Defend yourself against predatory bears while battling hunger and thirst. Meanwhile, you can collect wood and burning materials, make a fire, cook meat, and set a strategy with the materials you collect. Search chests and collect supplies. Hunting You can hunt bear and deer with a rifle or bow, cook and eat their meat. The rifle and bow can be found by researching terrain or houses. Regions 5 different unique locations and difficulty levels. A vast land and many regions are waiting for you to explore. By visiting the houses, you can light a fire and cook meat whenever you want. Basic Features Kill the bears and beat your own record. Each time you kill a bear, a new bear will spawn, increasing the difficulty If you are hungry or thirsty, light a fire or enter a house. Satisfy your hunger by cooking on fire Your condition will decrease if you get sick You can build various houses and cut trees in the game cook raw meat, quench your hunger Beware of bears, protect yourself Activities have an impact on food, water, hunger, vitality and health values. Beautiful and realistic open world with many views with the best graphics
